messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please research the following information about Super Bowl: date, champions, host stadium, host city, Nielsen HHLD rating, average viewership across all platforms (million, round to one decimal place), and the half-time show sponsors.  I need annual statistics from 2001 to 2025 (including 2001 and 2025). If viewership is unavailable, use '-' instead.

Please give me the organized data in the format of one Markdown table, with the column names as: 
Year, Champion, Host Stadium, Host City,  Nielsen HHLD Rating, Viewership (million), Half-time Show Sponsors.
For host city, give the full name of the city, like Houston. 

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?
<search>Super Bowl statistics from 2001 to 2025 including year, champion, host stadium, host city, Nielsen HHLD rating, viewership, and half-time show sponsors</search>

Search query: Super Bowl statistics from 2001 to 2025 including year, champion, host stadium, host city, Nielsen HHLD rating, viewership, and half-time show sponsors
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Bowl_television_ratings):
Super Bowl television ratings - Wikipedia ^ Jump up to: The original figure of 91.63 million was later revised by Nielsen due to their undercount of out-of-home viewers. However, the revised ratings ...

[Doc 2](https://www.sportsmediawatch.com/super-bowl-ratings-historical-viewership-chart-cbs-nbc-fox-abc/):
Super Bowl Ratings History (1967-present) - Sports Media Watch Super Bowl ratings and viewership dating back to the first game in 1967, including adults 18-49, streaming and Spanish-langauge figures.

[Doc 3](https://www.nielsen.com/news-center/2025/super-bowl-lix-makes-tv-history-with-over-127-million-viewers/):
Super Bowl LIX Makes TV History With Over 127 Million Viewers An estimated 127.7 million viewers tuned in for Super Bowl LIX on Sunday, February 9, according to Nielsen, making it the largest audience for a Super Bowl.

Search query: Super Bowl champions from 2001 to 2025
Result: [Doc 1](http://www.espn.com/nfl/superbowl/history/winners):

Super Bowl Winners List - NFL Champions by Year - Topend Sports Updated Super Bowl winners list 2025! Philadelphia Eagles beat Chiefs 40-22. Complete NFL champions history 1967-2025 with scores & venues.

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.topendsports.com/events/super-bowl/hosts/index.htm):
Super Bowl Host Cities & Locations by Year (1967-2028) The next three Super Bowls will be at Caesars Superdome in New Orleans (2025), Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara (2026), and SoFi Stadium in Los ...
